description: Try our easy to follow Sabre Tooth Tiger Smoothie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Back to school,Banana,Strawberry,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Mango,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Sabre Tooth Tiger Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place banana, cucumber, mango, strawberries, spinach leaves, almonds, chia seeds and coconut water into a blender and blend until smooth
Pour into tall glasses and serve.
